ingredients.ingredient: 1 ½ pounds fresh strawberries, rinsed and sliced
¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper

cookingTips: Select ripe strawberries at peak sweetness for best results
Toss gently to avoid breaking delicate berries
Let salad sit 15 minutes before serving so juices release and flavors develop
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How does black pepper enhance the natural flavors of strawberries?
